Cyclic

Quiz about professional cycling.

Situation

Cyclic is a simple mobile app quiz about professional cycling—which rider won a race, who was the part of the team during a race, what place took a team during a race.

Task

Create a logo and UI design for a mobile app quiz about professional cycling.
